casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mark Leonard MORGAN. No. 203P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 30, 2008. Allen Brotherton, Charlotte, for Morgan.

Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of April 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of April 2008."
